strings.dialog.jsonEditor.title: JSON Editor
strings.update.updaterNotFound: Update program does not exist, please choose another update method!
strings.settings.keyBindingDescription: If you have in-game key remapping needs, please configure the corresponding remapping here
strings.settings.enableGlobalKeyMappingDescripti: Make key binding settings effective for external scripts
strings.settings.mapTrackingFeatureMatchingMetho: Feature Matching Method for Map Tracking
Affects all map tracking functions, takes effect after restart
strings.settings.worldMapTeleportSettingsDescrip: Configuration for teleport functions in map tracking, auto domain, one-dragon and other features
strings.settings.enableMapZoomDuringMovementDesc: Recommended to enable, disabling this setting may cause errors when running some scripts
strings.settings.maxMouseMovementDistance: Maximum distance for single mouse movement
strings.settings.maxMouseMovementDistanceDescrip: [100-2000] Too large may cause mouse to move out of window
strings.settings.mapZoomOutDistanceDescription: [>600] Greater than this distance will zoom out the map to speed up teleportation
strings.settings.mapZoomInDistanceDescription: [200-600] Less than this distance will zoom in the map to improve movement precision
strings.settings.mouseMovementIntervalDescriptio: [2-100] Smaller numbers make mouse movement faster, if map movement causes stuttering, please increase this value
strings.settings.statueOfTheSevenDescription: Used to specify the Statue of The Seven for healing
strings.settings.useNearestStatue: Use nearest Statue of The Seven for healing
strings.settings.useNearestStatueDescription: When enabled, will automatically select the nearest Statue of The Seven, ignoring the specified location below
strings.settings.moveAfterTeleportToStatue: Move after teleporting to Statue of The Seven for healing
strings.settings.moveAfterTeleportToStatueDescri: When enabled, will automatically move towards the Statue of The Seven
strings.settings.statueCountryDescription: Select the country where the Statue of The Seven is located
strings.settings.statueRegionDescription: Select the region where the Statue of The Seven is located
strings.settings.showMaskBorderDescription: Purple border line around the game window
strings.settings.useMaskSubform: Start mask as Genshin subform (experimental feature)
strings.settings.useMaskSubformDescription: The mask can fully follow window movement, but has some bugs, this configuration takes effect after restart
strings.settings.healingWaitIntervalDescription: [1.0-30.0] How long to wait for health recovery after teleporting to Statue of The Seven
strings.settings.importLocalScriptRepo: Manually import local script repository (zip format)
strings.settings.importLocalScriptRepoDescriptio: Use when script repository cannot be updated online
strings.settings.otherSettingsDescription: Configure some other functions, auto-restore when losing focus, etc.
strings.settings.autoActivateGameWindow: Force restore game window activation when game loses focus
strings.settings.autoActivateGameWindowDescripti: Applies to scheduler tasks and some independent tasks, after losing focus, will automatically activate the game window. After enabling this, if you want to switch out of the game window, you can pause the task first, then switch out
strings.settings.autoCollectExpeditions: Auto collect expeditions during scheduler path tracking world map teleportation
strings.settings.autoCollectExpeditionsDescripti: In scheduler path tracking tasks, when opening the world map to prepare for teleportation, will first check if there are expeditions to collect, if so, will automatically collect expeditions (calling one-dragon reward collection logic), takes effect after selecting collection city.
strings.settings.schedulerErrorRestartConfigDesc: When scheduler tasks throw unexpected errors, after accumulating a certain number of times, automatically restart BGI to restore functionality.
strings.settings.errorCountDescription: When running scheduler tasks, the count of failures caused by exceptions, BGI will restart when this count is reached.
strings.settings.farmingPlanConfigDescription: When enabled, when daily farming (starting from 4 AM) exceeds the limit (requires script support, check allow farming statistics flag, or through control files in tracking file directory to record tracking file data), will skip subsequent farming tasks.
strings.settings.dailyEliteLimitDescription: When farming elite count reaches the limit, skip farming scripts with elite as main target.
strings.settings.dailyMobLimitDescription: When farming mob count reaches the limit, will skip farming scripts with mobs as main target.
strings.settings.useMihoyoDataDescription: Use HoYoverse data (about 2-3 hours delay) to correct farming counts. Since HoYoverse cookies expire after some time and need to be re-obtained, if HoYoverse data exists for the day, the limit should follow the configuration below, otherwise follow the limit configuration above (considering killing outside of farming, like fodder time cards, so estimated values may differ).
strings.settings.mihoyoDailyEliteLimitDescriptio: When farming elite count reaches the limit, skip farming scripts with elite as main target.
strings.settings.mihoyoDailyMobLimitDescription: When farming mob count reaches the limit, will skip farming scripts with mobs as main target.
strings.settings.mihoyoSettingsDescription: Used to configure HoYoverse related information like cookies
strings.settings.syncCookieWithSchedulerDescript: When enabled, when scheduler log changes, or changes here, will sync their cookies.
strings.settings.versionUpdateDescription: Check if new version is available
strings.settings.betaVersionWarning: [Beta Version] Very unstable, please choose to update carefully!
strings.settings.getLatestBetaFromGithub: Get latest beta directly from Github
strings.settings.aboutBetterGIDescription: View project, documentation and other information
strings.settings.restartGameTooDescription: When restarting BGI, also restart the game. Need to enable homepage startup configuration: start Genshin simultaneously, auto enter game, for this configuration to take effect.
strings.settings.combatFailureIsErrorDescription: In farming scripts, actual combat success count must be greater than or equal to expected combat count to succeed, otherwise throw exception. Can solve infinite deadlock that may be caused by failed map opening, team switching, or stuck in Z switching interface, stuck monthly card, etc. during farming. But need to ensure your team strength, whether it's possible that consecutive scripts exceeding configured failure count all revive too many times, causing judgment failure and triggering infinite restart.
strings.settings.incompletePathIsErrorDescriptio: Stricter condition than combat failure. With this checked, tracking files that are not executed completely count as failure. Checking this requires high stability of your tracking tasks. You can first observe logs without checking, open exception statistics to see if there are consecutive red marks exceeding failure count, if so, not recommended to check.
strings.app.title: Better Genshin
strings.settings.title: Settings
strings.settings.exitToTray: Minimize to system tray on exit
strings.settings.exitToTrayDescription: When enabled, the exit button in the top right will minimize to system tray and continue running, right-click tray icon to exit
strings.settings.screenshotDescription: Can take screenshots to folder log/screenshot via hotkey
strings.settings.screenshotHotkeyDescription: Screenshots are mainly used for debugging exceptions, training set creation, and other quick acquisition of equal width and height screenshots
strings.settings.screenshotUidCoverDescription: Generated screenshots will cover UID information in bottom right corner
strings.settings.httpServerDescription: Can be called by external programs, restart required after modification
strings.settings.httpServerPortDescription: Port number that HTTP server listens on, range 1-65535
strings.settings.showLogWindowDescription: Show log window on startup, convenient for viewing log files
strings.settings.showTaskStatusDescription: Show real-time task status on startup
strings.settings.showGameFpsDescription: Restart required after changing this setting, may cause game bugs
strings.settings.showImageRecognitionDescription: Real-time display of various image recognition results
strings.settings.enableUidCoverDescription: Cover UID information in bottom right corner
strings.settings.showMinimapDirectionsDescriptio: Show north, south, east, west directions around minimap
strings.home.subtitle: Better Genshin, Free and Open Source
strings.home.captureDescription: Various functions can only be used after the screenshot tool is started, click to expand startup related configuration.
strings.home.captureDescriptionPart1: Various functions can only be used after the screenshot tool is started,
strings.home.captureDescriptionPart2: click to expand startup related configuration
strings.home.triggerIntervalDescription: Default 50ms, not recommended for regular users to adjust this value, see documentation for specific adjustment methods
strings.home.testCaptureDescription: Test function, test the effects of several screenshot modes
strings.home.manualSelectWindow: Manually select window (use when Genshin window cannot be found)
strings.home.manualSelectWindowDescription: Use when Genshin is already running but clicking start still prompts window not found
strings.home.manualSelectWindowDescriptionFixed: Use when Genshin is already running but clicking start still prompts window not found
strings.home.autoCloseWin11Optimization: Auto close Windows 11 window optimization to support BitBlt
strings.home.autoCloseWin11OptimizationDescripti: Game restart required after changing settings
strings.home.launchGenshinDescription: When starting screenshot tool, if Genshin is not running, automatically launch Genshin
strings.home.launchGenshinSimultaneouslyDescript: When starting screenshot tool, if Genshin is not running, automatically launch Genshin
strings.home.genshinInstallPath: Genshin installation location (cloud Genshin linkage launch not supported)
strings.home.genshinInstallLocation: Genshin installation location (cloud Genshin linkage launch not supported)
strings.home.launchParametersDescription: If you don't know what launch parameters are, please don't fill in.
strings.home.launchParametersWarning: If you don't know what launch parameters are, please don't fill in.
strings.home.autoEnterGameDescription: Auto enter game after Genshin starts (auto open door, collect monthly card)
strings.home.autoClickMonthlyCard: Auto click to collect monthly card
strings.home.autoClickMonthlyCardDescription: Auto click monthly card after entering game, if available
strings.home.useStarwardRecord: Use Starward to record game time
strings.home.useStarwardRecordDescription: Starward will sync record time after launching game
strings.home.wgcBitmapCache: Enable bitmap cache for WindowsGraphicsCapture screenshot mode
strings.home.wgcBitmapCacheDescription: Try disabling this function when cloud Genshin black screen or Genshin frame drops, restart software
strings.macro.title: Macros and Quick Operations
strings.macro.oneKeyMacroDescription: Auto recognize current combat character, press hotkey to execute corresponding macro
strings.macro.hotkeyTriggerModeDescription: Hold to repeat: repeat execution while holding, stop when released; Click: execute once per click
strings.macro.macroConfigDescription: Configure macro for each character, example: Neuvillette A key combo, see instructions
strings.macro.defaultMacroPriorityDescription: When character's macroPriority is set to 0, use this default macro number (1~5)
strings.macro.characterMacroSettingsDescription: Official game supports configuring macros for each character. Right-click in character interface to set macroPriority field (1-5), set to 0 to use default combat priority above.
strings.macro.neuvilletteDescription: Auto horizontal normal attack spinning, requires hotkey configuration to use
strings.macro.mouseDistanceDescription: Value is pixel distance, larger value moves faster, please don't set too large
strings.macro.mouseIntervalDescription: Interval should be set to number greater than 0, too small will cause tab switching to be ineffective, recommended to be the same
strings.macro.fastEnhanceDescription: Auto click enhance button, requires hotkey configuration to use
strings.macro.enhanceDelayDescription: If delay is too small for normal enhancement, please appropriately increase this time setting
strings.macro.oneKeyBuyDescription: Use in shop interface/exchange page, first select item, then start continuous purchase clicking
strings.macro.teapotDescription: One-key auto open chests, collect furnishings, collect animals, etc.
strings.macro.confirmCancelDescription: Bind hotkey to replace Genshin's confirm/cancel buttons
strings.macro.spaceHoldDescription: Mountain climbing tool, auto hold space function, can be not recommended to enable
strings.macro.fHoldDescription: Auto pickup tool, quite useless under auto pickup functions
strings.notification.title: Notification Settings
strings.notification.allowJsNotificationsDescrip: Allow JavaScript scripts to send notifications
strings.notification.qqNumberDescription: Fill in QQ number to receive messages
strings.notification.groupNumberDescription: Fill in group number to receive messages
strings.notification.workWeixinWebhookUrlDescrip: Fill in Work Weixin notification address
strings.notification.emailSettings: Email related settings (account password completely saved locally)
strings.notification.smtpPortDescription: Fill in SMTP server port, usually: 587
strings.notification.emailPasswordDescription: Fill in email password or authorization code
strings.notification.barkDeviceKeysDescription: Multiple devices separated by commas, semicolons or spaces
strings.notification.barkApiEndpointDescription: Fill in Bark API endpoint, example: api.day.app
strings.notification.barkGroupDescription: Display by group in notification center
strings.notification.telegramApiBaseUrlDescripti: Fill in Telegram API base address (optional)
strings.notification.xxtuiSettings: xxtui information push notification related settings
strings.notification.xxtuiApiKeyDescription: Fill in information push API Key
strings.scriptGroup.gadgetIntervalDescription: Auto use gadgets during movement, fill 0 to not use
strings.scriptGroup.onlyInTeleportRecoverDescrip: Only go to Statue of The Seven for recovery when path is at teleport point
strings.scriptGroup.skipDuringDescription: After completing a route, if the time is the currently configured time (range: 0-23), then all subsequent map tracking tasks will be skipped. Suitable for continuous execution fallback tasks, for example, if you want to hang overnight and start new tasks after 4 AM.
strings.scriptGroup.optimizeSkillCd: Optimize team members based on skill CD
strings.scriptGroup.optimizeSkillCdDescription: Based on filled character names or names with CD, decide whether to skip this character's turn when their elemental skill CD is not ready, to optimize combat flow. Can fill character names or character names with numbers (separated by commas), multiple types separated by semicolons, example: Baizhu;Zhongli,12;. If character name, use built-in CD check (or filled number is also less than 0), if character name with number, treat number as skill CD (seconds).
strings.scriptGroup.autoCombatEndDetectionDescri: Stop auto combat function when combat is detected to have ended
strings.scriptGroup.quickCombatEndCheckDescripti: Quick check for combat end. In one round of script, can check every certain seconds (default 5) or after specified character action (when each character completes that round of script).
strings.scriptGroup.quickCombatEndCheckParamsDes: Parameters for quick combat end check. Can fill numbers and character names, multiple types separated by semicolons, example: 5;Baizhu;Zhongli;. If number (less than or equal to 0 won't check based on time, unit is seconds), specify check interval. If character name, check after that character executes one round of operations. Check after each round remains unchanged.
strings.scriptGroup.combatEndCheckDelayDescripti: Combat end check delay. Different characters may have different delays after their moves end, default is 1.5 seconds. Can also specify how many seconds to delay check after specific characters. If character name not specified, default to this value. Format like: 2.5;Baizhu,1.5;Zhongli,1.0;
strings.scriptGroup.keyPressCheckDelayDescriptio: Delay to check screen color blocks after pressing team switch, default is 0.45 seconds. If frequent misjudgments, can appropriately increase this value, like to 0.75. Ensure this delay doesn't actually bring up the team configuration interface.
strings.scriptGroup.autoPickupDropsDescription: Try to pickup surrounding drops after combat ends (works better with Kazuha)
strings.scriptGroup.autoPickupDurationDescriptio: Unit is seconds. 0 means no auto pickup drops.
strings.scriptGroup.executeKazuhaLongEAfterComba: Execute Kazuha long E after combat
After combat ends, if Kaedehara Kazuha exists, execute Kazuha long E after combat to use this character for material collection
strings.scriptGroup.pickupCombatThresholdDescrip: Pickup combat count threshold. When combat count is less than certain number and combat ends, don't trigger pickup drops and Kazuha pickup configuration. Only takes effect when not less than 2.
strings.scriptGroup.onlyPickupEliteDropsDescript: Requires path file support, needs to check distinguish monster pickup to take effect, can be viewed through repository tags. Elite monsters can be marked in point's More > Extended Config > Monster Tags. Only pickup points marked as elite or legendary. Non-elite allow auto pickup: drops at feet during combat can be auto picked up, but won't execute Kazuha pickup and auto pickup configuration logic. Non-elite disable pickup: even drops at feet during combat won't be auto picked up.
strings.scriptGroup.kazuhaPickupTeamNameDescript: After combat ends, if Kazuha doesn't exist, switch to team with Kazuha (based on enabling Kazuha pickup and filling team name will switch). Suitable when needing one more person for experience and replacing Kazuha's position. Combat strategy should be compatible with both teams to prevent continued combat even if team switch fails.
strings.scriptGroup.combatTimeoutDescription: Auto stop combat after combat exceeds certain time
strings.scriptGroup.shellExecutionConfigDescript: Shell commands executed in this group will use configuration here. If this is disabled, use default configuration.
strings.scriptGroup.disableShellTasksDescription: If enabled, shell tasks will be skipped
strings.scriptGroup.shellExecutionTimeoutDescrip: Maximum time to wait for command return, unit seconds. If time <= 0, don't wait and return directly.
strings.scriptGroup.hideCommandWindowDescription: Recommended to enable, otherwise there will be a big black box.
strings.scriptGroup.logCommandOutputDescription: If enabled, command output will be shown in Log if command has output, if disabled it won't show. (Only shows when command executes successfully and has output)
strings.scriptGroup.pathingActionConfigDescripti: When map tracking reaches target point, some actions will be executed. Some actions must configure corresponding character position in team
strings.scriptGroup.normalAttackCharacterIndex: Character index for normal attack in team
strings.scriptGroup.normalAttackCharacterIndexDe: Generally used for collecting plants that require elemental reactions
strings.scriptGroup.elementalSkillCharacterIndex: Character index for elemental skill in team
Used for collecting Cor Lapis etc.
strings.pathingConfig.title: Map Tracking Settings (Configuration priority from high to low, UI style issues not yet resolved)
strings.pathingConfig.partySettings: Team switch settings (when path contains qualifying actions/collectibles, auto switch to corresponding team)
strings.pathingConfig.avatarSettings: Character settings (when multiple qualifying characters exist, prioritize using smaller in-game team index)
strings.pathingConfig.gadgetIntervalDescription: Auto use gadgets during movement, fill 0 to not use
strings.pathingConfig.onlyTeleportRecoverDescrip: Only go to Statue of The Seven for recovery when path is at teleport point
strings.task.title: Independent Tasks (Experimental)
strings.task.autoGeniusInvokationDescription: Fully automatic matches - Click to view usage tutorial
strings.task.stopTaskDescription: Stop execution of independent tasks below
strings.task.selectDeckDescription: Select the deck configuration you want to use
strings.task.setDelayDescription: Network delay causes recognition to be too fast, can appropriately increase unrecognized wait time
strings.task.autoWoodDescription: Equip 'King Tree's Blessing'. Refresh game through loop teleportation to refresh wood collection -
strings.task.loopCountDescription: How many times to loop wood cutting, set 0 for infinite loop until manual stop
strings.task.enableOcrWoodLimit: Enable OCR wood count limit (1080P game resolution only)
strings.task.enableOcrWoodLimitDescription: OCR recognize accumulated wood count during wood cutting, auto stop when limit reached
strings.task.woodCountLimit: Wood count limit (Genshin daily limit 2000 per wood type)
strings.task.woodCountLimitDescription: Takes effect after setting wood count limit, auto stop when reaching set limit
strings.task.gadgetDelayDescription: If the popup prompt after using gadget is too fast when cutting wood, can adjust this value
strings.task.optimizeByCd: Optimize team members by skill CD
strings.task.optimizeByCdDescription: Optimize team based on team member skill CD situation. When elemental skill CD is not ready, will skip this member to optimize combat flow. Multiple member skill CD format, separated by commas, example: Neuvillette;Zhongli,12;Furina. If member skill CD is empty (or skill CD is also less than 0), no optimization. Multiple numbers, first value represents skill CD (seconds)
strings.task.autoDetectFightEndDescription: Stop auto combat function when combat is detected to have ended
strings.task.fasterFightEndCheckDescription: Faster combat end detection. In one type of script, default check every certain time (default 5 seconds) whether specified character died (when each character filters script)
strings.trigger.title: Real-time Trigger Automation Task Settings
strings.trigger.autoPick.title: Auto Pickup
strings.trigger.autoPick.description: When option is not NPC dialog and not in blacklist, auto press F to pickup/interact
strings.trigger.autoPick.fastModeDescription: When enabled, no longer recognize specific pickup content, blacklist and whitelist will be invalid
strings.trigger.autoPick.ocrEngine: Select auto pickup text recognition engine
strings.trigger.autoPick.ocrEngineDescription: Paddle recognizes all text, slow speed, low consumption; Yap recognizes partial text, fast speed and accurate, high consumption
strings.trigger.autoPick.blacklistDescription: Exclude NPC dialogs, various interaction options, items that don't need pickup, etc.
strings.trigger.autoPick.whitelistDescription: Content that needs active F interaction, please use with blacklist
strings.trigger.autoPick.customKeyDescription: Default is F, includes E key, other keys need to be changed accordingly, see documentation
strings.trigger.autoSkip.title: Auto Story
strings.trigger.autoSkip.description: Quickly skip story text, auto select options, auto submit items, etc.
strings.trigger.autoSkip.backgroundMode: Enable background mode (will only use interaction key for story)
strings.trigger.autoSkip.backgroundModeDescripti: Please don't minimize game, mouse will auto return to game when not in dialog
strings.trigger.autoSkip.quickSkipDescription: If you want to listen to complete main story voice, can disable this function
strings.trigger.autoSkip.optionPriorityDescripti: Prioritize first option, select last option, don't select option
strings.trigger.autoSkip.optionDelayDescription: Convenient to still see options clearly during auto story
strings.trigger.autoSkip.submitGoodsDescription: When submit items interface appears in dialog, will auto submit, supports multiple items
strings.trigger.autoSkip.closePopupDescription: Close popup pages in dialog, may mistakenly close map, camera
strings.trigger.autoSkip.dailyRewardsDescription: When talking to Katheryne, will auto 'collect daily commission' rewards
strings.trigger.autoSkip.reExploreDescription: Auto collect completed expedition rewards and re-dispatch
strings.trigger.autoHangout.title: Auto Hangout
strings.trigger.autoHangout.description: This function only takes effect when auto story is enabled, auto select hangout options
strings.trigger.autoHangout.skipButton: Auto skip when skip button exists
strings.trigger.autoHangout.skipButtonDescriptio: When skip button exists in top left during hangout, will auto click skip
strings.trigger.autoHangout.branch: Select hangout branch (bubble-linked selection not supported)
strings.trigger.autoHangout.branchDescription: Will select options based on selected branch keywords
strings.dialog.confirmMigrateConfig: Old BetterGI configuration detected, migrate configuration and clean old directory?
strings.dialog.migrateConfigSuccess: Configuration migration successful, program will auto exit, please manually restart BetterGI.
strings.dialog.confirmResetRepo: Confirm reset script repository? When unable to connect, please use this function first, then update script repository again.
strings.dialog.securityError: Detected current BetterGI is located on C drive, may fail to modify directory permissions, may cause WebView2 related functions to be unusable.
strings.dialog.noCustomConfig: This script doesn't provide custom configuration
strings.dialog.onlyJsHasConfig: Only JS scripts have custom configuration
strings.dialog.configGroupExistsMessage: Configuration group {0} already exists, please don't add duplicate
strings.dialog.copyConfigGroupFailed: Configuration group {0} already exists, copy failed
strings.dialog.renameConfigGroupFailed: Configuration group {0} already exists, rename failed
strings.dialog.selectJsScript: Please select JS script to add
strings.dialog.selectKeyMouseScript: Please select key-mouse script to add
strings.dialog.selectPathingTask: Please select map tracking task to add
strings.dialog.shellWarning: Executing shell commands has extremely high risk, please ensure you have reviewed the command instructions and confirmed safety before running!\nDuring shell execution, the game may lose focus
strings.dialog.enterShellCommand: Please enter shell command to execute
strings.dialog.blacklistConfig: Blacklist configuration, one record per line
strings.dialog.blacklistPlaceholder:
Please enter blacklist configuration here, one record per line.
Example:
Mondstadt's Chest
Slime Condensate
Merchant's Price
strings.dialog.whitelistConfig: Whitelist configuration, one record per line
strings.dialog.whitelistPlaceholder:
Please enter whitelist configuration here, one record per line.
Example:
Investigate
Synthesize
Cook
strings.toast.selectRepoChannel: Please select a script repository update channel
strings.toast.updatingRepo: Updating script repository, please wait patiently...
strings.toast.repoUpdateSuccess: Script repository updated successfully! Please restart
strings.toast.waitForUpdateComplete: Please wait for current update to complete before setting operations
strings.toast.repoResetSuccess: Script repository reset successful, please update script repository again.
strings.toast.repoNotExist: Script repository doesn't exist, please update first
strings.toast.startScreenshotFirst: Please start screenshot on startup page first, then use this function
strings.toast.useSchedulerForMultiple: When executing multiple map tracking tasks, please use scheduler function
strings.toast.noCookieWarning: Cookie not filled, this time only setting statistics:
strings.toast.gettingTravelData: Getting traveler data from HoYoverse, please wait patiently.
strings.toast.mihoyoDataSuccess: HoYoverse data obtained successfully, starting calculation, please wait patiently.
strings.toast.mihoyoApiError: HoYoverse API exception, this time statistics will not include HoYoverse data:
strings.toast.mihoyoApiErrorNoStats: HoYoverse API exception, this time only setting statistics:
strings.toast.selectCombatStrategy: Please first select combat strategy in left list:
strings.toast.combatStrategyNotExist: Currently selected auto combat strategy file doesn't exist
strings.toast.noSecretTreasureConfig: Secret treasure configuration not set, please set first
strings.toast.selectTreasureWarning: Selection is empty, please select treasure
strings.toast.selectConfigAndTask: Please first select configuration group and task
strings.toast.executeConfigFailed: Failed when executing configuration group task
strings.toast.configAlreadyExists: One dragon configuration {0} already exists, please don't add duplicate
strings.hotkey.title: Hotkey Settings
strings.hotkey.description: Global hotkeys only support combination keys and function keys, single letters cannot take effect directly. When input method is supported, recommend disabling input method and buttons, or switching hotkey type. Some conflicting functions not recommended to use global hotkeys.
strings.scheduler.experimentalSelectOrAddGroup: (Experimental function) Please select or add configuration group in left sidebar
strings.scheduler.rightClickToAddModifyDrag: Right-click in left sidebar to add/modify configuration groups, drag to sort configuration groups. Configuration groups can add and configure Javascript scripts, key-mouse scripts, etc. within the software, and can control execution count, order, etc.,
strings.scheduler.clickToViewTutorial: Click to view scheduler usage tutorial
strings.scheduler.rightClickOrButtonToAdd: Right-click in left sidebar to add configuration group, or directly click button below to add configuration group
strings.scheduler.rightClickToAddDragToReorder: Right-click in list below to add configuration, drag to adjust execution order. Supports Javascript scripts, key-mouse recording scripts, etc. within BetterGI. Through scheduler can set script execution count, order, etc.
strings.scheduler.exportTasksModifiedByControlFi: Export tasks modified by control file
strings.scheduler.name: Name
strings.jsScript.title: Custom Javascript Scripts (Experimental)
strings.jsScript.description: Can call BetterGI's various abilities in Genshin through Javascript, please use in scheduler!
strings.jsScript.viewTutorial: Click to view Javascript script usage and writing tutorial
strings.jsScript.name: Name
strings.scriptRepo.title: Script Repository
strings.hardware.title: Inference Device Configuration
strings.hardware.restartRequired: Program restart required after modification, please confirm modification may cause program exceptions
strings.hardware.inferenceDeviceTypeDescription: Select hardware device type for inference, default uses CPU
strings.hardware.gpuDeviceIdDescription: Specify GPU device number to use, set to 0 for default configuration, can view number in Task Manager
strings.hardware.optimizedModel: Output optimized model files to cache
strings.hardware.optimizedModelDescription: Note: Using on unsupported executors will cause exceptions, disabled by default.
strings.hardware.cudaDeviceIdDescription: Specify CUDA device number, set to 0 for default configuration, can view number in nvidia-smi
strings.hardware.autoAppendCudaPathDescription: Auto add system CUDA environment path, enabled by default
strings.hardware.additionalPathDescription: Additional path paths, separated by ;, empty by default. Can be used to add DLL paths
strings.hardware.enableTensorRtCacheDescription: Improve TensorRT model loading speed, enabled by default
strings.hardware.embedTensorRtCacheDescription: Embed engine cache in model file, enabled by default
strings.hardware.cacheManagementDescription: Old version cache files can be manually deleted.
strings.hardware.forceCpuOcrDescription: Solve some GPU inference performance issues, enabled by default
strings.update.defaultServerDescription: Regular users can click to update directly
strings.update.mirrorServerDescription: Mirror users can enter CDK for high-speed update
strings.update.hutaoCloudDescription: Hutao Cloud CDN users can use Hutao Cloud CDN for high-speed update
strings.welcome.openSourceFree: 🔹 This software is open source and free, if you like the project you can click 🌟Star ->
strings.welcome.firstTimeUse: 🔹 First time use please first view
strings.welcome.neverAuthorized: ❗This software has never authorized any third-party platform for
strings.welcome.ifPaidFor: . If you paid for this software (Xianyu, Taobao, etc.), please report the seller and demand
strings.picker.doubleClickToSelect: Double-click to select window to capture
strings.captureTest.title: Screenshot test window
strings.about.title: BetterGI - Better Genshin
strings.about.author: Author:
strings.mapPathing.title: Map Tracking (Experimental)
strings.mapPathing.description: Can implement auto collection, auto mining, auto fishing and other functions. Please use in scheduler!
strings.mapPathing.viewTutorial: Click to view map tracking recording and usage tutorial
strings.mapPathing.name: Name
strings.oneDragon.craft.title: Craft Condensed Resin
strings.oneDragon.dailyCommission.title: Daily Commission
strings.keyBindings.title: Key Binding Settings
strings.keyBindings.description: Key settings here default take effect for built-in functions except auto pickup, fishing, rhythm game, wood cutting. Enable 'Global Key Mapping' in settings to take effect for JS scripts, combat scripts, simple strategy scripts in map tracking. Please manually set pickup key, Honkai Star Rail key, hide main interface key.
strings.scriptGroup.pathingConfigDescription: Force modify movement; set healer/shielder character index in team
strings.scriptGroup.autoPickDescription: Recommended to enable, pickup drops and collectibles in path
strings.scriptGroup.partyNameDescription: Team name is the team configuration name you manually set in-game
strings.scriptGroup.visitStatueBeforeSwitch: Force go to safe statue area before team switch
strings.scriptGroup.visitStatueBeforeDescription: Go to statue then switch team members, avoid team switch failure due to abnormal position status when switching teams
strings.scriptGroup.guardianAvatarDescription: Healer/shielder character position, recommended: Qiqi, Layla
strings.scriptGroup.guardianElementalSkillInterv: May need to set slightly longer than actual skill CD time
strings.scriptGroup.guardianElementalSkillLongPr: Zhongli long press shield, Qiqi long press transformation, etc.
strings.scriptGroup.mainAvatarIndex: [Movement] main movement character index in team
strings.scriptGroup.mainAvatarDescription: Recommended same as survival position, no special configuration needed
strings.scriptGroup.combatConfigDescription: Enable map tracking configuration above, enable this to set combat configuration, disable this to use team configuration settings
strings.scriptGroup.taskCycleConfigDescription: By day unit, decide whether to execute this configuration group
strings.scriptGroup.boundaryTimeDescription: Boundary time, generally set 0 or 4. Set 0 to start from 0 o'clock, set 4 to start from 4 AM, less than 4 o'clock counts as previous day.
strings.scriptGroup.cycleDescription: Different materials have different cycles, configure as needed: ore cycle 3, breakthrough material cycle 2, or set how many days to execute once.
strings.scriptGroup.indexDescription: Execution cycle index, by timestamp days (adjusted according to boundary time), mod cycle plus 1. Execute when matching configuration value, skip when not matching. Can be understood as which day in cycle to execute.
strings.scriptGroup.calculateExecutionIndexDescr: Click calculate button to calculate today's execution index (which day in cycle is today).

strings.notification.workWeixinEndpointDescripti: Fill in Work Weixin notification address
strings.notification.deviceKeyDescription: Multiple devices separated by commas, semicolons or spaces
strings.notification.notificationGroupDescriptio: Display by group in notification center
strings.notification.savePushHistoryDescription: Choose whether to save push history
strings.notification.chatIdDescription: Fill in chat ID to receive messages
strings.notification.apiBaseUrlDescription: Leave empty to use official API, or fill in third-party API address
strings.notification.apiKeyDescription: Fill in information push notification API key
strings.notification.notificationSourceDescripti: Fill in information push notification source
strings.notification.notificationChannelDescript: Fill in information push notification channel
strings.notification.dingTalkWebhookUrlDescripti: Fill in DingTalk bot notification address
strings.pathingConfig.mapTrackingSettings: Map Tracking Settings (Configuration priority from high to low, UI style issues not yet resolved)
strings.pathingConfig.teamSwitchSettings: Team switch settings (when path contains qualifying actions/collectibles, auto switch to corresponding team)
strings.pathingConfig.characterSettings: Character settings (when multiple qualifying characters exist, prioritize using smaller in-game team index)
strings.pathingConfig.onlyRecoverAtTeleportDescr: Only go to Statue of The Seven for recovery when path is at teleport point
